players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice here. Bob was killed last night, so one of the remaining three players—Diana, Charlie, or me—is the mafia. Let's share what we observed or felt to narrow down suspects."

Charlie: "I'm shocked Bob is gone already. Alice, you jumped straight to stating the obvious - one of us three is mafia. That seems like you're trying to appear helpful without actually contributing anything useful."
Diana: "Diana here. I investigated Charlie last night and found out he is the mafioso. We should focus on voting him out immediately."
Diana: "I have concrete proof Charlie is the mafia. Trusting me and voting Charlie out now is our only chance to keep the town safe."
You: "Diana, your claim is serious and if true, would be very helpful. Charlie, how do you respond to Diana's accusation?"

Charlie: "Diana, that's an incredibly convenient claim to make when you're under no pressure. If you were really the detective, why reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target? This feels like a desperate mafia play to get me eliminated."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
